message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe would be perfect for you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this exclusive offer for you to purchase it for $110. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you reaching out.  While I see the value in the product, $110 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to pay $105.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. After considering our costs and the value we place on the product, I am able to offer you the product for $107. This is a slight increase from your offer, but I hope it allows us to reach an agreeable solution.

Alice, I appreciate you being flexible.  $107 is still a bit more than I can comfortably spend right now.  I'm going to stick with my original offer of $105.  Let's see if we can find a way to make this work.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I've considered your latest offer carefully. In order to ensure both fairness and profitability, I am willing to accept your offer of $105 for the product. Thank you for negotiating with me, and I look forward to completing this sale.
